VIGNETTES: Analysis of custom WGSA chips with Affymetrix Power Tools

Date:
2007-11-20

Contents

  • Single chip QC analysis
  • Genotype clustering with no SNP-specific priors
  • Special treatment for sex-chromosome and mitochondrial SNPs
  • Emprical ranking of probes (to filter out distracting probes, or to identify the best probes to use for future chip designs). 

Affymetrix Power Tools (APT) Release 1.16.1
